results.title: Simvastatin in an experimental spinal cord injury model: a histopathological and biochemical evidence based study.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were divided into 5 groups:1) @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@ control, 2) Sham operated, 3) @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@ with 10 mg/kg intraperitoneal @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 4) @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@ with 10 mg/kg oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 5) @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@ with 10 mg/kg subcutaneous @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin and Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Improve the Neurological Function and Attenuate the Endothelial Inflammatory Response after Spinal Cord Injury in Rat.
results.text_hl: The animals were divided into 4 groups: (1) sham group, laminectomy only (n=6); (2) no-treatment group, @<m>DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@ without therapy (n=8); (3) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (n=8), and (4) @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combination therapy group (n=8).
